Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at BH Atarazanas Málaga Boutique Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Malaga, steps from Mercado de Atarazanas and minutes from MIMMA. This hotel is within close proximity of Plaza de la Constitucion and Carmen Thyssen Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 39 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and babysitting/childcare. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of BH Atarazanas Málaga Boutique Hotel.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of BH Atarazanas Málaga Boutique Hotel.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at BH Atarazanas Málaga Boutique Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Malaga, steps from Mercado de Atarazanas and minutes from MIMMA. This hotel is within close proximity of Plaza de la Constitucion and Carmen Thyssen Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mercado de Atarazanas - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
MIMMA - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza de la Constitucion - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Carmen Thyssen Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Centre de Arte Contemporaneo - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Port of Malaga - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Palacio Episcopal - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Malaga Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Picasso Museum Malaga - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Plaza Aduana - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Tajo's Tree-Lined Avenue - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Malaga Amphitheatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Alcazaba - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Plaza de la Merced - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Teatro Cervantes de Malaga - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for BH Atarazanas Málaga Boutique Hotel is Malaga (AGP) - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
